choices: Male, sucked into the Dragon Ball world
Female, sucked into the Dragon Ball world
1.content: For starters, which gender are you? And how do you end up meeting Android 21?
1.title: The begining of the strange adventure

11.content:
You were smart, and had the skills to build anything. However you had this one certain device that you hadn't used, nor did you pay it any mind.

So, you pulled it out from where you hid it at as you dusted it off. After you had cleaned it, you were hesitant about using it. Without any second thoughts, you bushed the button as your entire room glowed brightly.

----

You were soon free falling into a new yet familiar world, you noticed a grassy field below you as you landed with a thud onto the ground. Oddly not injured by it, you scanned the area after you got up.

"Where am I? I know this place...it looks familiar." You walked around a bit as you were unaware of someone approaching you.


Who approached you?
11.title: Device used

choices: Yes, you manage to run away but she's on your tail
Nope, 21 shrinks you down with her energy beam
113.content:
Majin 21 approached you, but it wasn't her good self. The Majin grins as she crossed her arms looking at you. "Hello there....my what a fine young man I've found."

You spun around as you saw 21 standing here, you got a little confused as why she was the only one out in the middle of nowhere with you. But you remembered, she could fly..you didn't want to say much if she was going to ask questions. "I know you...you're Android 21."

21 cocked an eyebrow up as she licked her pink Majin lips. "Mmm, I see so another fan of mine I assume?"

"Another?" You asked wondering what she meant.

"Oh yes...a student from Orange Star High School heard of my wonderful work." 21 said. "They studied under my teaching until well..." 21's stomach erupted with loud growl as she smacked it a little. "Let's just say they satisfied my hunger for a bit."

Your eyes widen as you backed up a bit. "Screw this, I'm out of here!"

Do you manage to run away from the hungry Majin?
113.title: Hungry Majin 21

choices: Nope, Majin 21 was on the other side of the cave
1131.content:
You make like a banana and split from the hungry Majin as fast as you can, you knew she'd be on your tail as you could feel the wind blowing behind you.

21 growls as she then smirked. "Run all you want to my yummy treat....I'll find you until you're all mine!" She powered up and flew straight behind her. "No where to run!"

"Crap, crap, crap." You said as you looked back seeing her behind you. "This is bad...why couldn't I have been found by 18 or Bulma?" You then noticed a cave nearby. "Great, I just need to lose this chick."

"I'm coming closer!" 21 said with a giggle. "I can't wait to gobble you up!"

You looked around and managed to grab a few rocks and threw them back at 21, 21 blasted them as this gave you time to run into the cave.

After you ran into the cave, you hide behind a bigger rock. You heard 21 slowly enter the cave soon after.

"Come out, come out where ever you are." 21 said. "I'm so very hungry and my belly wants you so badly." 21 giggled as she walked around the cave as her stomach let out a massive growl which echoed in the cave. "You see? Come on out, it wants you."

You stay hidden despite hearing her calls, you did feel as if she was looming over you. Was she right where you were hiding at?
1131.title: A game of chase

choices: She does some experaments on you
Teases you before she gobbles you up
Makes you her slave until she's really hungry
1132.content:
Majin 21 takes notice of your sudden shock as she pointed her finger at you as she charged up what you assumed was a death beam. You turned around and started to run, stumbling a bit until..

21 grins as she had the look of hunger and lust in her eyes as fired the beam at you as she watched you glow pink from it. "Oh look, looks like I have a new play toy."

You slowly shrank down before 21 as you had stopped glowing soon after, you blinked both horrified and speechless at what happened. "W-What did you do to me!?"

21 giggled with glee and delight as she walked over to your shrunken form. "Why I shrank you of course...I can't have my newly found prey running away from me now can I?" Android 21 knelt down and snatched you up off the ground as she giggled again. "Oh what fun we'll be having."

You struggled in her grip as you found it useless to try and escape the giant Majin. "What are you going to do to me?"

21 didn't give you a answer as she looked at you as if she was looking into your soul. She flew into the air and closed her hand around you as she flew off back to her lab.

What does 21 do once she gets back?
1132.title: Shrunken down by a Majin

11322.content:
Landing back at her lab, 21 headed inside before opening her hand once more, allowing her plaything to see the hunger in her eyes. To say you were scared would be a colossal understatement!

“What do you plan to do to me?” You asked, trembling in fear of the massive Majin.

“Well, since you insist on knowing...” 21 proceeded to taunt you, “I’m going to eat you! Your puny body won’t last long in my stomach, and soon you’ll be reduced to body fat! Maybe your soul will even stick around inside me~”

The thought of dying a painfully slow death in 21’s gastric acids, or worse, being trapped forever as part of her body was more than enough to leave you downright terrified. If you ever by some slim chance got out of this situation alive, you were certain to have nightmares for quite some time.

Needless to say, you turned and jumped off the giantess’s hand, making a run for it.
11322.title: Fearsome Fate

12.content:
You were doing some important stuff in your bedroom, like cleaning and whatnot. You decided to boot up FighterZ to play a little bit with Android 21's character to get to know her moves and skills better.

However, there was a thunderstorm in the area as a bolt of lightning struck down knocking out the power. But something odd happened, the lights flickered for a moment as you were no longer in your bedroom.

----

You were groggy as you rubbed your aching head, you sat up as you heard a familiar voice behind you.

"Are you alright?" The voice asked as they stood behind you. "I found you passed out, outside and brought you in."

You turned around to see who was speaking to you, who do you see?
12.title: Power outage and into a new world

choices: You choose to be turned into an apple
Not fast enough, Evil 21 shows up
121.content:
"Oh thank goodness, you're alright....my name is Android 21.." 21 said with a small smile. "However, as for you. I cant' say how long my evil half will be out looking for you."

"W-What?" You asked confused.

"Yes, my evil half forced me to bring you into our world." 21 said. "However, she was out looking for you after you were brought here to our world." She folded her arms as she adjusted her glasses. "We need to hide you before she returns."

"How? Unless you know some sort of magic trick that will make me invisible to the naked eye, then I don't have any clue where." You said.

"Well...if there's one thing myself and my evil self doesn't like it's healthy food." 21 said as she looked at you. "But you have to trust me on this, I promise you that she won't notice."

You felt a bit unsure how it would work, but you were speaking with 21 of all people, she had powers that you knew too well. "F-Fine, but what if she ask?"

"You got away that's all." 21 said as she looked away. "If it cost me my own life for her then I have no choice." 21 looked at you with a shocked expression. "Oh no, she's on her way...quick make your choice now."

Do you make a suggestion on what to be transformed into or does Evil 21 get there first?
121.title: Android 21 (Good)

125.content: Okay then, was it Chi-Chi?
125.title: More

13.content:
You were a fan of the Dragon Ball series for a long time, you were amazed at how much stuff Bulma was capable to make. So you were thought why not look up to Bulma as a role model, despite her being a fictional character in an anime.

One day you decided to try your hand at making some sort of device, though you weren't too sure if it would work or not. Shrugging it off, you placed the device aside as you booted up FighterZ to get some more ideas on how to fix up your device.

----

You eventually get around to fixing it up like you wanted it to, though it looked like the dragon radar but you knew it wasn't. Curiously you did wonder if it would work as you pushed the button that was on it, until you vanished from your room.

After you had vanished from your room and world. You started to reappear in a new place but looked oddly familiar to you, but you couldn't place your finger on it.

Where were you?
13.title: Inspired by Bulma

info.brief_description: Since there's no Android 21 story up here, thought I'd be the first to do it.
info.description:
You are either transported into the world of Dragon Ball via device, or pulled into the Dragon Ball World by Android 21.

Rules are simple, even though I had stated on my profile that my account is no longer active. I thought I'd do this before my membership expires.

Anyway the rules are.

No gas
No male characters
No toilet's
No gore


Vore is allowed
Transformation is allowed
Android 21 must be either her normal form or in her Majin form
Good 21 will also be optional
Please add, do no strive away from what's listed
Relationships with 21 are okay if you can withstand her power
Other female character's can make cameos
